# rotate(by:)

**Instance Method**

Rotates the entity rotated by the specified rotation around the origin.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func rotate(by rotation: Self.Rotation)
```

## Parameters

- **rotation**: The rotation.
title: rotate(by:)
